column4: What would be the 'recommended' system requirements for the main Ubuntu release? Right now my brother uses a P2-400 running xubuntu. If that would not be enough would a P3-733 or Duron900 likely do it?
That link gives indications for installation, but I am primarily interested if his P2-400 can actually run the full gnome desktop.
im sure it can run it, but it wont perform exceptionally well.
